segments.text: I have to talk to you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What , Hilary ? I ’ m really in a hurry !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , Blake . But you ’ Ve been avoiding me all morning , and we have got to talk about this deal with the Mc Kinsey Food Company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve been busy , Hilary . We can set up a meeting to talk about the deal , but I still feel the same way . I don ’ t think it ’ s worth it .
segments.speaker: S2
